title: Former Ministers wish new PM on appointment
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Former Minister Namal Rajapaksa has extended his wishes to the newly appointed Prime Minister, Ranil Wickremesinghe as he takes on the task of driving the country forward.

Meanwhile, the General Secretary of the Ceylon Worker’s Congress, Jeevan Thondaman has stated that he wishes the newly appointed Prime Minister the best, although there are many issues to be addressed, that he assures the fullest cooperation of the CWC.
